message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $130. It's a great deal, considering it's worth much more to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $120.  This is still a great value for you, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about $115? I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
